description: From French gasconnade, from Gascon (“native of Gascony”) +‎ -ade, equivalent to Gascon (“native of Gascony”) +‎ -ade, literally "to talk like a Gascon". See French gasconnade.

adjectives.description: gasconade (comparative more gasconade, superlative most gasconade)

entries.meaning: (obsolete) Of or pertaining to exaggeration or extravagant boasting; bombastic.

verbs.description: gasconade (third-person singular simple present gasconades, present participle gasconading, simple past and past participle gasconaded)
